cause.title: Cause
cause.description: String identifier which will be sent along with job trigger request.

#api_key.title: API Key
#api_key.description: API Key string, How to get one is explained here

dbt_cloud_url.title: DBT Cloud URL
dbt_cloud_url.description: Optional - default is https://cloud.getdbt.com, more information about Dbt URLs here

max_wait_time.title: Max wait time
max_wait_time.description: Max time to wait. Used only when parameter Wait for result is set to true.

wait_for_result.title: Wait for result
wait_for_result.description: Select this if you want the component to wait until defined job finishes and then store artifacts.
